tourBios.exmtStatus: Exempt - Finished 11-45 at 2015 Web.com Tour Qualifying Tournament (exempt to second reshuffle)
tourBios.carHigh: 2014: Played in nine events on the Mackenzie Tour and made one cut, a T16 at the ATB Financial Classic.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Became the first player in 50 years to win the Maine Junior Championship three consecutive years (2002-04)...Was ranked 64th nationally according to the Junior Golf Scoreboard when he signed with TCU in November 2004...Transferred to Mississippi after his freshman season.
tourBios.personal: Home-schooled throughout high school...Enjoys playing Fantasy XM Fantasy Sports and Xbox Games...If we were not a professional golfer, he would like to join the Special Forces...His walk-up song on the first tee would be "Last One Alive" by Demon Hunter...Cites chipping in five times in one round as his biggest thrill experienced in golf...Very interested in the military and loves reading books that have to do with military greatness...Says the greatest sporting event he ever attended was his brother's YMCA championship game...Not many people know that he is an avid catamaran sailor.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the Web.com Tour was 76th in 2016 at the El Bosque Mexico Championship presented by INNOVA.
dyn.dynStats: He ranks 4th in Driving Distance on the Web.com Tour.
